name: v1.2.0.Final
body:
- [**Enhancement**][**UI**] Add a "read-only" mode to the UI [#466](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/466)
- [**Enhancement**] Add support for YAML at least for OpenAPI/AsyncAPI [#462](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/462)
- [**Task**][**UI**] Ace editor syntax highlighting for non-JSON artifacts [#454](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/454)
- [**Task**][**UI**] Add a 500 Server Error page [#451](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/451)
- [**Task**][**UI**] Add a 404 error page [#450](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/450)
- [**Bug**][**UI**] Handle special characters in Artifact ID [#448](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/448)
- [**Task**] Versions search operation support [#444](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/444)
- [**Task**] In-memory storage search support [#431](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/431)
- [**Task**] Kafka storage search support [#422](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/422)
- [**Task**] JPA storage search support [#421](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/421)
- [**Task**] Create content extractors [#420](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/420)
- [**invalid**] Content extraction not working for SQL storage impl [#419](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/419)
- [**Task**] Trim down the size of our downstream maven repo [#415](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/415)
- [**Task**][**invalid**] Remove Jersey from the Connector distro [#414](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/414)
- [**Task**] Streams storage search support [#412](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/412)
- [**Task**] Allow registry to be configured to connect securely to Kafka [#411](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/411)
- [**Task**] Reduce footprint of converter distribution [#389](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/389)
- [**EPIC**] Search API (for use by User Interface) [#386](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/386)
- [**Enhancement**] Implement JSON Schema compatibility rule [#373](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/373)
- [**Quality**] Rename Id strategy classes [#368](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/368)
- [**Enhancement**] Consider making artifact versions immutable [#363](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/363)
- [**Enhancement**] Improve artifact creation and update [#362](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/362)
- [**closed**] Automatically extract Name/Description from artifact content [#351](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/351)
- [**closed**] Duplicate all unit tests to use Caching and Non-Caching client [#341](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/341)
- [**Task**] Registry User Interface [#322](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/322)
- [**closed**] Hibernate exception when deploying JPA prod [#284](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/284)
- [**Enhancement**] Add support for Web Services artifact types [#256](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/256)
- [**closed**] Validity Rule: Kafka Connect Schema [#219](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/219)
- [**closed**] Deploy: Create OpenShift operator [#28](https://github.com/Apicurio/apicurio-registry/issues/28)
